-- ============================================= -- Author: Дудченко Юра -- Create date: 2018.02.16 -- Description: -- ============================================= CREATE PROCEDURE dsh_compareWith1cDatabase
AS BEGIN
-- реализации
select del.[key], del.date, del.guid, del.binaryGuid, del.sumAll, del1c.sum1c, DATEADD(year,-2000, del1c.date) as date1c
from ent_Delivery as del
right join (select
_Number as [key], _fld14025 as sum1c, _IDRRef as binGuid, _Date_Time as date
from [ka_sat].[dbo].[_Document503] as deliveryDoc ) as del1c
on del.binaryGuid = del1c.binGuid
where del.sumAll != del1c.sum1c or del.sumAll is null
order by del1c.date
-- возвраты
select rg.[key], rg.date, rg.guid, rg.binaryGuid, rg.sumAll, ret1c.sum1c, DATEADD(year,-2000, ret1c.date) as date1c, ret1c.returnCause
from ent_ReturnGoods as rg
right join (select
_Number as [key], _Fld5599 as sum1c, _fld5605 as returnCause, _IDRRef as binGuid, _Date_Time as date
from [ka_sat].[dbo].[_Document308] as returnDoc ) as ret1c
on rg.binaryGuid = ret1c.binGuid
where rg.sumAll != ret1c.sum1c or rg.binaryGuid is null
order by ret1c.date
END
